pinboard.description: Sets the pinboard channels for the server. When both are set, each time a message is pinned in the `in` channel, it is posted to the `out` channel as a backup.

roleme.description: Commands for adding or removing roles to yourself.

args.add: (can also be used with just katze roleme) adds a role to yourself from the list of roleme roles.
args.create: (requires permissions) creates a blank role with the specified name and adds it to the list of roleme roles.
args.disable: removes a role from the list of roleme roles.
args.enable: adds a role to the list of roleme roles.
args.list: shows all the roleme roles in this server.
args.remove: removes a roleme role from yourself.

star.description: Set of commands for interacting with the starboard.

args.show: <id> the id of a star to show in the current channel.
args.stats: show some statistics of the starboard in this server.

starboard.description: Set of commands for administering the starboard.

args.channel: sets the channel in which to post new stars. it is recommended to remove send message permissions from everyone but this bot. `none` to disable.
args.emoji: sets the emoji to treat as a star. send a :star: to reset.

avatar.description: Shows a full size avatar for yourself or a target user.

delete.description: Deletes an image from the rotation, and sends it back to you. To see images, type `katze list`.

emojis.description: Shows the top 10 emojis used in the server in the last week, add `all` to see all of them.

farm.description: Shows any user with a discriminator the same as yourself or the target user. Send a discriminator (1234) to see those.

link.description: Link a role ID to an invite code. This bot must have the Create Instant Invite permission. use `katze roles` to see the role IDs for this server.

list.description: Shows all the images in this server's icon rotation.

migratepins.description: Using the pinboard in and pinboard out channels, send all pins from the in channel to the out channel as messages.

pin.description: Force a message into the pinboard out channel from any channel. You must use this command in the same channel as the message.

pls.usage: %spls <image link or target user or upload an image>
pls.description: Add an image to this server's icon rotation, and set it as the current icon.

roles.description: Show the list of roles in this server.

rotate.description: Change the server icon with one of the ones in the rotation. To see the list of images, type `katze list`.

show.description: Shows a specific image from the rotation. To see the list of images, type `katze list`.

timeout.description: Change how often the icon rotates. Can be any number between 1 and 24.
